Articles.Content: Hello all. New to the forums and dabbled in ksp for awhile now. Looking to really get into it now. What I've managed to do so far is finally make a plane that flies (albeit with SAS on still). I've managed to also orbit the mun and launch a few orbital missions, but I'm currently tackling career mode and my next goal is setting up a solid LEO station and solid network of satellites

Hello A Wandering Mage and welcome to the forum!

It sounds like you're well on your way.  I'm sure you will find the forum to be a very helpful and informative resource as you progress up the learning curve.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the KSP Community!

Great to have you aboard!

Thanks for the warm welcome! And as long as that learning curve isn't that parabolic arc straight into the ground most of us rookies have I think I'll be good. You're right about the help though. Been browsing for a few days and have already learned alot!!
